column1: Published Course Length (in days, including weekends and holidays)

* Complete all course modules
* Complete 24-week program and Capstone Project
* Sign a sustainability agreement to work in Central NY area for at least two (2) years

no work authorization, continuing to further education, or self-enrichment)?
1B. Full-time apprenticeship, internship, or contract position (30+ hours/week, 3-6 months)
1C. Short-term contract, part-time position, freelance, or unknown length
1D. Started a new company or venture after graduation
2C. Not seeking a job for health, family, or personal reasons

The pink boxes represent the “canonical” number, which must be the most prominent number a school uses in its advertising.
